t: Amazon Publishing - Wikipedia
s: April 3, 2025 - Amazon Publishing (or simply APub) is Amazon's book publishing unit launched in 2009. It is composed of 15 imprints including AmazonEncore, AmazonCrossing, Montlake Romance, Thomas & Mercer, 47North, and Topple Books. Amazon publishes e-books via its Kindle Direct Publishing subsidiary.
